To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private ShortLineCandle _shortlinecandle;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_shortlinecandle = ShortLineCandle(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_shortlinecandle.IsReady)
{
    var period = _shortlinecandle.Period.Value;
    var current = _shortlinecandle.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.shortlinecandle = self.ShortLineCandle(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.shortlinecandle.IsReady:
    period = self.shortlinecandle.Period.Value
    current = self.shortlinecandle.Current.Value
